getLogger

public java.util.logging.Logger getLogger()
Description copied from interface: ContainerServices
Gets a Logger object that the component should use for logging.

The Logger will be set up with a namespace specific to the component that uses this ContainerServices instance.

Specified by:
getLogger in interface ContainerServices
Returns:
Logger

assignUniqueEntityId

public void assignUniqueEntityId(EntityT entity)
                          throws ContainerException
Description copied from interface: ContainerServices
Creates a unique id and sets it on the given (binding class) entity object. The id will be redundantly stored in an encrypted format so that later it can be verified that the id is indeed the one originally assigned.

Specified by:
assignUniqueEntityId in interface ContainerServices
Parameters:
entity - must be freshly created and
ContainerException

getComponent

public org.omg.CORBA.Object getComponent(java.lang.String componentUrl)
                                  throws ContainerException
Description copied from interface: ContainerServices
Gets the specified component as a Corba object.
  • This method is necessarily generic and will require a cast to the requested interface, like in HelloComponent helloComp = HelloComponentHelper.narrow( containerServices.getComponent("HELLOCOMP1"));.
  • if requested, we may come up with some additional way (e.g. a code-generated singleton class) to give type safe access to other components, like done with EJB xxxHome.
  • the Container will later shortcut calls for components inside the same process. Like in EJB and CORBA, the implementation must therefore not assume receiving a by-value copy of any parameter from the other component.

Specified by:
getComponent in interface ContainerServices
Parameters:
componentUrl - the ACS CURL of the deployed component instance.
Returns:
the CORBA proxy for the component.
Throws:
ContainerException - if something goes wrong.

releaseComponent

public void releaseComponent(java.lang.String componentUrl)
Description copied from interface: ContainerServices
Releases the specified component. This involves notification of the manager, as well as calling _release() on the CORBA stub for that component. If the curl is not known to the container, the request will be ignored.

Specified by:
releaseComponent in interface ContainerServices
Parameters:
componentUrl - the name/curl of the component instance as used by the manager

findComponents

public java.lang.String[] findComponents(java.lang.String curlWildcard,
                                         java.lang.String typeWildcard)
                                  throws ContainerException
Description copied from interface: ContainerServices
Finds components by their instance name (curl) and/or by their type. Wildcards can be used for the curl and type. This method returns a possibly empty array of component curls; for each curl, you may use ContainerServices.getComponent(java.lang.String) to obtain the reference.

Specified by:
findComponents in interface ContainerServices
Parameters:
typeWildcard - (null is understood as "*")
Returns:
the curls of the component(s) that match the search.
ContainerException
See Also:
si.ijs.maci.ManagerOperations#get_COB_info

createXmlBindingWrapper

public java.lang.Object createXmlBindingWrapper(java.lang.Class componentInterface,
                                                org.omg.CORBA.Object componentReference,
                                                java.lang.Class corbaOperationsIF)
                                         throws ContainerException
Description copied from interface: ContainerServices
Takes a reference to another component and creates a wrapper object that can translate between entity object parameters as serialized XML (in corbaOperationsIF) and the corresponding Java binding classes (in componentInterface).

Specified by:
createXmlBindingWrapper in interface ContainerServices
Parameters:
componentInterface - component interface with XML binding classes.
componentReference - reference to the component to be wrapped, as obtained through getComponent(String), thus implements corbaOperationsIF.
corbaOperationsIF - component interface where entity objects are represented as \ serialized XML inside a CORBA struct.
Returns:
the dynamically created wrapper object that implements componentInterface.
ContainerException
